name: Harsh Sunlight
description: A harsh sunlight creates extreme heat through the battlefield, there is lava on the floor and some objects just burst into flames. You might need special equipment to go through this weather.
effect:
- All Fire-Type moves have +1 minimum damage and deal 1 flat damage at the end of damage calculation.
- All Fire moves gain the Never Fail and High Critical trait.
- All Water-Type Moves fail to be executed.
- Add 2 dice to any roll of Chance Dice to Burn a foe.
- No one can be affected by the Frozen Status Condition.
- Moves that add positive effects in Rain, Snow or Hail Weather fail to be executed.
- Other Weather conditions fail to activate through any means.
